radiographic_examinations.findings: Trace right pleural effusion, moderate signal drop-off in hepatic parenchyma indicating steatosis, mild intrahepatic bile duct dilation, gallbladder filled with stones, 5 mm filling defect in distal CBD compatible with a stone, 6 mm cyst in lower pole of right kidney, mildly enlarged spleen, left anterior intra-abdominal mass measuring 13.0 x 12.1 cm with increased signal intensity on T1 and T2.
